bike.description: S-Works FACT 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design, 1.5" lower HS bearing, OS BB

S-Works SL, FACT carbon handlebar, short-reach drop, 31.8mm
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon w/ neoprene padding
S-Works FACT carbon, integrated oversize design
Silver cage, black body, w/ toe clip and strap
S-Works Mondo Open Tubular, 700x23c 290TPI w/ Aramid bead
